title: Summoner Icons
body:
So, I remember this discussion on the boards (I don't know or where it is cause it's so old), but this guy came up with the idea of having your champion as your Summoner Icon when you reach lvl 7 on the champ or when you get over a specific number of mastery points. I'm just wondering (knowing that it's a great idea) if it'll be an actual thing, cause that would be much appreciated and I'd be happy!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: So  you only play 1 champ? That's sad.
For every lvl 7 champ you have, you get the icon for that champ (from their original splash art)
